item.title: Donator Status ---
item.dc:creator: @Junes Junes
item.description:
@Junes wrote:

[quote=“Dastan_, post:2, topic:362680”]Change this

if(wearID == 14028 && donator == 1) {

to

if(wearID == 14028 && donator == 0) {

and try to wear it.

then try to wear it with account who has no donator’s rank <— ( it will probably tell you that you need to be a donator to wear it ).[/quote]

1 = you are a donator so if you are putting ==1 “sm:you must be donator to wear this” its going to mess up on you lol do as dastan says and you shall have fixed it

Read full topic

item.title: Donator Status ---

item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

Change this

if(wearID == 14028 && donator == 1) {

to

if(wearID == 14028 && donator == 0) {

and try to wear it.

then try to wear it with account who has no donator’s rank <— ( it will probably tell you that you need to be a donator to wear it ).

item.title: Donator Status ---
item.dc:creator: @_BOOM .:BOOM:.
item.description:
@_BOOM wrote:

I have Donator on my server(Thanks to Dastan_) And when I try equip a Donator item it keeps saying “You must be a donator to wield this item”. I added the donator code for the item and stuff properly, and my donator rights is set to 1 as it should be. I also put my username in Donator.txt. Help please :o

Code that made the item for donators only;

if(wearID == 14028 && donator == 1) { sM("You must be a donator to wield this item."); return false; }

On the first line

if(wearID == 14028 && donator == 1) {

You can see that i made it for donator = 1 . So that is done properly ! ?

Read full topic
